name: Blaze 2D Game
description:
Blaze 2D Game - A top-down style roguelike game. The game involves moving from room to room after defeating a boss. The player wins when they defeat the last 10 bosses.

Authors:
Dawid "thebaku" Bak - https://github.com/theb4ku
Adrian "Zexelos" Połączak  - https://github.com/Zexelos
